meaningMnemonic: You have 発売, which means "for sale," and then you have 中 which is <kanji>middle</kanji>. An item that is in the middle of being for sale is <vocabulary>now for sale</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>in stores now</vocabulary> or in other words <vocabulary>now available</vocabulary>. You'll see this for items which have recently been released or when a shopkeeper wants to let you know that they're selling something now, finally, or whatever.
readingMnemonic: The reading comes from 発売 and 中 (kanji reading) put together.
